definition: (coll.) sb new to a particular subject/rookie/beginner/newbie
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam

sentences.english: You can hear the sergeant bellowing at the rookies.
sentences.chinese: 你可以聽到士官長對着菜鳥們大吼。

sentences.english: Neither have closed-door meetings or trying out rookie hurlers.
sentences.chinese: 開密室會議及派菜鳥投手上場也沒有扭轉頹勢。

sentences.english: One of the “newbies” I was responsible for came from Hawaii.
sentences.chinese: 我負責的是一個來自夏威夷的“菜鳥”。

sentences.english: The women have gone from being novelty racers to contenders.
sentences.chinese: 女孩們已經完成了從菜鳥車手到錦標爭奪者的蛻變。

sentences.english: Kazuki Nakajima has had a very strong season so far, given his rookie status.
sentences.chinese: 衣櫃本賽季目前爲止作爲菜鳥車手來講都很強。

sentences.english: The smart-aleck rookie detective got himself in trouble.
sentences.chinese: 這個自作聰明的菜鳥偵探讓自己身陷危機。

sentences.english: Professional soldiers are predictable but the world is full of rookies.
sentences.chinese: 專業的士兵是可預測的，但世上卻充滿了菜鳥。

sentences.english: I just started using Weixin a few days ago. I'm still a newbie.
sentences.chinese: 我幾天前剛開始玩微信，現在還處於菜鳥級別。

sentences.english: Some newbies may be genuinely interested in the World Cup, and some won’t be.
sentences.chinese: 可能某些菜鳥是真的對世界盃感興趣，另一些則不然。

sentences.english: I tagged a first-timer one night at fight club.
sentences.chinese: 在搏擊俱樂部的某個晚上我欽點了一個菜鳥。

sentences.english: The fledglings are always small potatoes.
All you smug idealists are laughing at this newbie/idjit.
sentences.chinese: 你們這些沾沾自喜的理想主義者，嘲笑這隻菜鳥。

definition: in one's spare time/outside working hours/amateur (historian etc)
well qualified/competent/to be equal to the task/able to do sth very well
to point out/to indicate/to give directions/to show how (to do sth)/to censure/to pick at
entrance door/to enter a door/introduction (to a subject)
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
